nodes.text: Operation Starlight was a Rebel Alliance mission, the objective of which was to reassemble the Alliance Fleet after its scatter following the Battle of Hoth. Commander Grek of the Fourth Division derived the plan's name from the Starlight Beacon, a navigational station that had been constructed in the High Republic Era.
The operation proved successful as the Alliance Fleet reassembled at Sullust prior to the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY.
